name: The Tower(alpha demo)
description:
The Tower has been here for a long time. 

The tower is the symbol of safety and glory.

People are eager to take a higher place.

Numerous people challenge to the tower for a higher place.

 

And you.  Also one of that challenger.

 

Random weapon

In your hand, you only have inherited weapon.

If you're lucky, you can choose in some weapons.

Or even you can't have anything to choose.

 

 

Crossroad of choice

Sometime in the Tower, you might have to make a priceless determination.

Choose one. Lose one

Think cautiously and make the most valuable determination.

 

 

Changing character

Climbing tower is a tough journey to

Both body and soul.

As a climbing tower, your mind and attitude will be tested and face the moment of change.

 

It is your choice.

Resist change or cast it adrift or abandon.

 

Numerous ordeals

The tower is cruel.

For protecting their place,

for drag you down,

All others will disturb you.

homepage : https://neverthelessstudio.com
